summary: David Sloan must travel to Mexico to save his wife from a savage drug lord who's also an old nemesis.
cast: Sasha Mitchell|Kamel Krifa|Brad Thornton|Jill Pierce|Michele Krasnoo|Nicholas Guest|Thom Mathews|Burton Richardson|Deborah Mansy|Nicholas Anthony|Derek Partridge|Jackson D. Kane|Kevin Wooten|Terri Conn|Terence Porter|David Manzanares|David Efron|Rigan Machado|John Machado|Earl White|Scott Cohen|Peter Poching|Joselito 'Amen' Santo|Vernon Rieta|Dennis Alexio|MarkAnthony Baca|Dennis Chan|Dana Dru Evenson|Michel Qissi|Jean-Claude Van Damme
title: Kickboxer IV: el agresor
